core_principles: Fusion: Digital Gold textures + Deep Void Black
Motion: Every point earned feels physical (haptic/visual feedback)
RTL First: Design purely with logical properties (start/end) for Arabic support
Glow: Interactive elements must emit light, not just reflect it

typography.instructions: Import 'Cairo' and 'Tajawal' from Google Fonts in index.css. Use 'Cairo' for all UI elements (buttons, nav, headings) and 'Tajawal' for long-form text.

rtl_strategy.rule: ALWAYS use logical properties. NEVER use left/right for layout.
rtl_strategy.root_setup: Ensure <html dir='rtl' lang='ar'> is set in index.html or root layout.

SaqrCard.style: bg-saqr-card backdrop-blur-xl border border-saqr-border rounded-xl p-6 shadow-glow transition-all hover:shadow-glow-lg hover:border-saqr-gold/40
SaqrCard.usage: Dashboard widgets, Stat boxes, Ad containers

GoldenButton.style: bg-gradient-to-r from-saqr-gold to-amber-500 text-black font-bold rounded-lg px-8 py-3 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(255,215,0,0.3)] hover:scale-105 hover:shadow-[0_0_25px_rgba(255,215,0,0.5)] transition-transform active:scale-95

GlassNav.style: fixed bottom-4 left-4 right-4 md:top-4 md:bottom-auto bg-black/80 backdrop-blur-2xl border border-white/10 rounded-full px-6 py-3 flex justify-between items-center z-50 shadow-2xl

layout_patterns.bento_grid: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4 p-4 md:p-8
layout_patterns.hero_section: relative h-[60vh] flex items-center justify-center overflow-hidden bg-saqr-dark
layout_patterns.ad_viewer: fixed inset-0 z-[100] bg-black/95 flex flex-col items-center justify-center

visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle noise texture overlay to the background with opacity-5.

components: FloatingCoin: A spinning gold coin for rewards.

images.description: Wavy metallic grid - Use as subtle background texture for Hero
Liquid Gold Splash - Use for 'Withdraw' or 'Earnings' section header
Abstract Yellow Lines - Use for AI Support Page background

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for standard UI icons. Use 'framer-motion' for icon animations.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALLATION: Run `yarn add framer-motion @react-three/fiber @react-three/drei three lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge`.
2. SETUP: Add the custom colors and animations to `tailwind.config.js` immediately.
3. RTL: Ensure specific RTL classes (ps-4, me-2) are used. Verify logical properties.
4. 3D: Implement the `ThreeDCoin` component using R3F. If R3F fails or is too complex for the setup, fallback to a CSS 3D transform coin.
5. AI SUPPORT: Create a floating action button (FAB) that pulses with a gold glow.
6. AD VIEWER: This is the core. Make it cinematic. Dim the lights, spotlight the ad, show a 3D countdown.
7. PRESERVE: Do not break existing auth or database logic. Only wrap the UI.
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
NEVER use transparent backgrounds without a blur or scrim.
